section.title: Manage user group membership
section.p: The team list shows which user groups each team member belongs to. You can add and remove team members from user groups on this page. In the following screenshot, two team members have been selected and the "Groups" button has been clicked. You can see from the list of user groups that both team members belong to the "BAs" user group. At this point, you could remove both of them from the "BAs" user group or add them both to any of the other user groups.

screenshot.alttext: Managing user groups from team list

note.p: If a user group is partially checked, it means that some, but not all selected team members are part of the user group. In the following screenshot, Brenda and Dan are selected. Brenda is in the "BAs" user group, but Dan is not. Therefore, the "BAs" user group is partially checked. Likewise, the "Developers" user group is partially checked because Dan is in that user group, but Brenda is not.
